welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chico, a charming city known for its vibrant community, beautiful parks, and local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: Fast Eddie's Sandwich Shop

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chico Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chico Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oroville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn County Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
